Gun Skins Pack.name: Hellfire Revolver
Gun Skins Pack.description: Flames flicker down the barrel every time you draw. Cosmetic only.
Gun Skins Pack.lore: Forged in the last duel of the Ghost West.

Gun Skins Pack.name: Chrome Showstopper
Gun Skins Pack.description: Reflective silver skin that gleams with every shot. Style points included.
Gun Skins Pack.lore: So flashy, it might get you shot first.

Gun Skins Pack.name: Dusty Iron
Gun Skins Pack.description: Rust-tinted revolver from the Badlands. Feels cursed.
Gun Skins Pack.lore: No one remembers who owned it last. They didn’t last long.

Sound FX Pack.name: Yeehaw Echo
Sound FX Pack.description: Triggers a loud 'YEEHAW!' on successful shot.
Sound FX Pack.lore: Legacy of the Old Saloon Shootout champion.

Sound FX Pack.name: Ricochet Madness
Sound FX Pack.description: Adds a high-speed ricochet ping to your draws.
Sound FX Pack.lore: Once bounced a bullet across five wanted posters.

Sound FX Pack.name: Cowpoke Grunt
Sound FX Pack.description: Unique hit grunt for your cowboy foe.
Sound FX Pack.lore: The sound of losing never sounded so good.

Background Pack.name: Storm Showdown
Background Pack.description: Adds dynamic lightning and dark clouds to your duel background.
Background Pack.lore: Every thunderclap marks another draw won.

Background Pack.name: Saloon Sunset
Background Pack.description: Turns the backdrop into a glowing saloon sunset.
Background Pack.lore: Painted by an outlaw turned artist. He still owes rent.

Background Pack.name: Ghost Canyon
Background Pack.description: Duel among the haunted ridges of Ghost Canyon.
Background Pack.lore: Echoes from past duelists still whisper here.

FX Overlay Pack.name: Quickdraw Glow
FX Overlay Pack.description: Adds a golden glow ring around your cursor on shot.
FX Overlay Pack.lore: Only the fastest trigger this aura.

FX Overlay Pack.name: Phantom Blur
FX Overlay Pack.description: Your target blur-trails slightly before appearing.
FX Overlay Pack.lore: Even the wind can’t catch you now.

FX Overlay Pack.name: Bullet Comet
FX Overlay Pack.description: Adds comet tail FX to the explosion when you hit.
FX Overlay Pack.lore: Fast enough to light the air on fire.

NFT Preview Pack.name: The Last Draw
NFT Preview Pack.description: 1-of-1 NFT — only given to the fastest tournament duelist.
NFT Preview Pack.lore: No one wins it by luck. It must be earned.

NFT Preview Pack.name: Phantom Rider
NFT Preview Pack.description: Ultra-rare limited NFT with ghostly gun overlays.
NFT Preview Pack.lore: Rides through the code. Only appears every 1,000 duels.

NFT Preview Pack.name: Gunmetal Prophet
NFT Preview Pack.description: Epic NFT skin — silver trenchcoat, glowing eyes.
NFT Preview Pack.lore: He saw the burn mechanics before they launched.
